about.title: Léna Dubois, your sophrologist
about.description1: After 16 years in the world of chocolate making, I chose to take a new path: sophrology. I discovered it very young, during a difficult period in my schooling, and it has accompanied me ever since.
about.description2: Today, I want to pass on these simple and powerful tools in turn. I accompany children, teenagers and their parents to better navigate sensitive moments, tame their emotions and regain confidence and serenity.
about.description3: My intention: to offer a space of listening, gentleness and benevolence, where everyone leaves with concrete keys for their daily life.
